info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:07PM MDT until June 25 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BIG STONE...DEUEL...EASTERN HAMLIN...GRANT AND EASTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 1207 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stockholm to near Altamont to near Estelline, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Clear Lake, La Bolt, Altamont and Tunerville around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lake Alice, Revillo, Albee, Moritz, Gary, Lake Cochrane Rec Area, Toronto and Astoria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
